titles.title: A bill to require that the headquarters of certain Federal agencies and permanent duty stations of employees of certain Federal agencies be relocated in order to provide an opportunity to build needed infrastructure in certain areas and to share the benefits of Federal employment with economically distressed regions.
Helping Infrastructure Restore the Economy Act
Helping Infrastructure Restore the Economy Act
HIRE Act
HIRE Act
Helping Infrastructure Restore the Economy Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
